abstract: The officials are looking into accusations that some banks used shoddy paperwork to evict borrowers.
snippet: The officials are looking into accusations that some banks used shoddy paperwork to evict borrowers.
lead_paragraph: As the nation’s attorneys general announced a joint investigation into flawed paperwork filed to support home foreclosures, federal housing regulators urged lenders Wednesday to vet their foreclosure procedures and fix them.

headline.main: All 50 States Start Inquiry Into Foreclosures
headline.print_headline: Foreclosures Spur Action From U.S. And States
